task.title: Cleaning the steam wand and frothing attachment
task.shortdesc: The and should always be cleaned after frothing milk.

step.cmd: Remove the and rinse in warm tap water.
Use a -compatible cleaning tool to clean the two fine steam holes on either end of the .
Wipe the with a damp cloth, then with the directed back into the drip tray.
step.info: Briefly set the Selector Control to the ‘Steam’ setting (no less than 5 seconds).

step.cmd: Set the Selector Control to the ‘Standby’ position.
Press the ‘ON/OFF’ button to ‘OFF’, switch off at the power outlet, unplug the power cord and allow the machine to cool before starting it again.
